pr_title: HIVE-23741: Store CacheTags in the file cache level

timeline.message:
HIVE-23741: Store CacheTags in the file cache level

Change-Id: I2985b74b7b7864734d03180992295621bb82f9b5

timeline.bodyText:
This sets the reference from buffer to filecache instance alright.
But as far as I see this only happens when LowLevelCacheImpl is used, aka caching Orc files, how does this reference setting happen with the SerdeLowLevelCache (text based files)?
timeline.author: szlta

timeline.message:
Cache tag extract for text files as well.

Change-Id: I2928360d5fafed629bf96af487b24e0f56107945

Revert some required methods back from the base class.

Change-Id: I2bf372d242e6f0237f52ab2828bce9cf8a03dfdb
